dt: {bc}to avenge (oneself or another) usually by retaliating in kind or degree

et: Middle English, from Anglo-French {it}revenger, revengier{/it}, from {it}re-{/it} + {it}venger{/it} to avenge {ma}{mat|vengeance|}{/ma}
shortdef: to avenge (oneself or another) usually by retaliating in kind or degree
to inflict injury in return for
